projects.name: DocuTalk – AI PDF Chatbot
projects.description: Developed an AI chatbot to interact with PDF documents using Python, LangChain, ChromaDB, and Chainlit. Designed an ingestion pipeline and conversational interface, reducing query response time by 40%.

projects.name: Aadhaar Face Authentication
projects.description: Built a secure face authentication system using React.js, face-api.js, Flask, and Azure. Focused on full-stack development, real-time API integration, and anti-spoofing logic.

projects.name: RealG – PPE Alert + Geofencing System
projects.description: Deployed an OpenCV-based real-time PPE detection and geofencing alert system. Designed and optimized the object detection model and real-time edge-device processing using Python and Flask.

achievements: 1st Place in Tech Expo at PSG Itech

patents.title: Real-time Emergency Alert and Location Geofencing
